testCases.title: Dashboard Functionality and Effectiveness Validation
testCases.description: Verify the functionality and effectiveness of the dashboard in the CRM/Call Center System.

steps.stepDescription: Precondition: Ensure the CRM/Call Center System is properly configured and populated with relevant data.
Access the CRM/Call Center System.
Navigate to the dashboard section.
Verify the layout and organization of the dashboard components.
steps.expectedResult: The dashboard is well-structured, with a clear and intuitive arrangement of data and visuals.

steps.stepDescription: Check the availability of key performance indicators (KPIs) on the dashboard.
steps.expectedResult: The dashboard displays relevant KPIs accurately, providing insights into the system's performance.

steps.stepDescription: Interact with the dashboard elements (e.g., drill-down, filtering).
steps.expectedResult: The dashboard responds appropriately to user interactions, enabling further exploration and analysis.

steps.stepDescription: Validate the real-time updates of the dashboard data.
steps.expectedResult: The dashboard data is updated in real-time, reflecting the most recent information.

steps.stepDescription: Customize the dashboard view and preferences (e.g., rearrange widgets, set personalization options).
steps.expectedResult: The customization options allow users to tailor the dashboard according to their preferences.

steps.stepDescription: Repeat the above steps for different dashboard configurations and use cases.
steps.expectedResult: The system behaves as expected for all configurations.

testCases.title: Customer Interaction Tracking Verification
testCases.description: Verify the recording and tracking of customer interactions.

steps.stepDescription: Initiate a customer interaction, such as a phone call, email, or chat.
Record the details of the customer interaction.
Save the recorded customer interaction.
Retrieve the customer interaction from the system.
Verify that the recorded interaction details are accurate.
steps.expectedResult: Interaction details match the entered information.

testCases.title: Data Analysis Capabilities Assessment
testCases.description: Validate real-time and historical data analysis capabilities of the CRM/Call Center System.

steps.stepDescription: Ensure the system is configured with relevant data.
Access the CRM/Call Center System.
Navigate to the analytics section.
Select a real-time data analysis option.
Verify real-time analysis accuracy.
Select a historical data analysis option.
Customize historical data parameters.
Verify historical data accuracy.
Repeat steps for different analysis options.
steps.expectedResult: System performs consistently across different tests.

testCases.title: Report Generation Accuracy Verification
testCases.description: Verify the accurate generation of reports in the CRM/Call Center System.

steps.stepDescription: Ensure the system is configured with relevant data.
Access the CRM/Call Center System.
Navigate to the reporting section.
Select a predefined report template.
Customize report parameters (date range, filters).
Verify report accuracy.
steps.expectedResult: Data in the report is accurate.

steps.stepDescription: Export report to a format (PDF, Excel).
Repeat steps for different templates.
steps.expectedResult: Reports generate correctly for all cases.

testCases.title: Report Export Functionality Testing
testCases.description: Validate the system's ability to export reports to various formats.

steps.stepDescription: Generate a standard system report.
Export the report to PDF format.
steps.expectedResult: Report is exported to PDF correctly.

steps.stepDescription: Export the report to Excel format.
steps.expectedResult: Report is exported to Excel correctly.

steps.stepDescription: Export the report to CSV format.
steps.expectedResult: Report is exported to CSV correctly.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the formatting and content of each exported report.
steps.expectedResult: Exported reports maintain proper formatting and content.

testCases.title: Custom Report Creation and Management Validation
testCases.description: Verify the creation and management of custom reports.

steps.stepDescription: Access the custom report builder.
Create a new custom report with specific fields and parameters.
Save the custom report template.
Run the custom report.
steps.expectedResult: Custom report runs and generates data accurately.

steps.stepDescription: Modify the existing custom report.
Share the custom report with other users.
steps.expectedResult: Report is shared with specified users.

testCases.title: Report Scheduling and Distribution Testing
testCases.description: Validate the functionality of report scheduling and distribution.

steps.stepDescription: Access the report scheduling feature.
Create a new scheduled report with specific timing parameters.
Configure distribution settings (email recipients, formats).
Save the scheduled report configuration.
Verify that the report runs at the scheduled time.
Confirm that the report is distributed to the configured recipients.
steps.expectedResult: Report is delivered to all recipients correctly.
